parts.text:
DeepSpeed
{
"application": "DeepSpeed",
"framework": "PyTorch",
"model": "GPT-2",
"dataset": "stas/openwebtext-10k",
"hardware": {
"compute": "NVIDIA V100 GPUs",
"memory": "32GB per GPU",
"nodes": 16,
"GPUs per node": 4,
"cores per task": 40
},
"software": {
"deepspeed": "Zero stage 3",
"transformers": "transformers-clm-any-model-config",
"python": "Python 3",
"slurm": "Slurm Workload Manager"
},
"training_parameters": {
"batch_size": 4,
"epochs": 1,
"learning_rate": "auto",
"warmup_steps": 8,
"fp16": "enabled",
"gradient_accumulation_steps": "auto",
"gradient_clipping": "auto",
"steps_per_print": 2000
},
"model_parameters": {
"hidden_size": 11264,
"num_layers": 64,
"num_heads": 32,
"sequence_length": 1024,
"vocabulary_size": 50257
},
"other": {
"master_address": "SLURM_JOB_NODELIST",
"master_port": 6000,
"output_directory": "output_dir",
"checkpoint_directory": "$six_ALL_CCFRWORK/checkpoints/gpt2-1-node"
}
}
